Hero.yourTrainingPartner: AI Training Analysis for Garmin Athletes
Hero.description: Upload your Garmin workouts. Get instant AI insights. Track performance trends, optimize recovery, and train smarter with personalized recommendations from your data.

HumanoidSection.sportsScienceAccessible: We make sports science accessible to every athlete
HumanoidSection.aiInsightsToWhereYouTrain: We bring AI insights to where you train
HumanoidSection.creatingTrainingPartners: We create AI training partners that understand your goals

SpecsSection.description: Lominic transforms your Garmin data into actionable insights: 1. Upload - Connect your Garmin or upload FIT files. 2. Analyze - AI reviews heart rate, training load, and recovery. 3. Improve - Get personalized recommendations to train smarter. Focus on training. Let AI handle the analysis.

DetailsSection.aiPoweredInsights: AI-powered insights for every Garmin athlete
DetailsSection.fileSupportTypes: All Garmin devices, FIT, GPX, Strava
DetailsSection.getEarlyAccess: Upload your first workout in 30 seconds

ImageShowcaseSection.description: Our AI-powered platform transforms your workout data into actionable insights that help you train smarter and recover better.
ImageShowcaseSection.lominicAppInterfaceAlt: Lominic app interface showing AI training insights
ImageShowcaseSection.smartTrainingIntelligenceDescription: Built with advanced AI and sports science, our platform seamlessly analyzes your workouts from any device, providing personalized insights and recommendations to optimize your training.

Features.aiPoweredTrainingIntelligence: AI-Powered Insights for Every Training Session
Features.transformWorkoutData: Transform your Garmin workout data into actionable insights that help you train smarter and recover better.
Features.smartSummariesDescription: Get instant AI-generated summaries of every Garmin training session in plain language - no sports science degree required.
Features.askQuestionsDescription: Chat with your Garmin data! Ask 'Was this good for Zone 2?' or 'Did I overtrain this week?' and get intelligent answers.
Features.trackProgressDescription: Monitor weekly training load, heart rate trends, and improvement areas with intelligent analysis over time.
Features.compareWithFriendsDescription: Share progress and compare training insights with friends or training partners to stay motivated.
Features.recoveryInsightsDescription: Learn how to recover better and avoid overtraining with personalized recommendations based on your Garmin data.
Features.universalCompatibilityDescription: Works with all Garmin devices (Forerunner, Fenix, Vivoactive) and imports directly from Garmin Connect.

OptimizedFeatures.worksWithDevicesDescription: Works with all Garmin devices (Forerunner, Fenix, Vivoactive). Import directly from Garmin Connect. Analyze Garmin's advanced metrics (Training Effect, Recovery Time). Understand your Garmin data better than Garmin Connect.
OptimizedFeatures.poweredByAIDescription: Advanced AI analyzes your Garmin data instantly. â€¢ Heart rate zone optimization â€¢ Training load recommendations â€¢ Recovery pattern insights â€¢ Personalized coaching tips. Get recommendations that match your fitness level and goals.
OptimizedFeatures.yourPrivacyDescription: We keep your workout data private and secure. Bank-level security. We never share your personal information. You control what data you share and can delete it anytime.
OptimizedFeatures.seeYourTrendsDescription: Go beyond basic stats with smart progress tracking. Understand your training load, recovery patterns, and performance improvements over time with clear, actionable insights.

Testimonials.testimonial1Content: Finally understand what my Garmin data means. Lominic transformed my training by making complex data actually understandable. I finally know if I'm overtraining or if my recovery is on point.
Testimonials.testimonial2Content: Better insights than Garmin Connect. As a cycling coach, I recommend this to all my athletes. The AI insights help them understand their training load and recovery needs better than any app I've seen.
Testimonials.testimonial3Content: My Fenix 7 data makes sense now. The conversational AI is incredible. I can ask 'Was this a good Zone 2 session?' and get a detailed explanation that actually makes sense. Game changer for my training.
Testimonials.testimonial4Content: Finally, an app that doesn't just show me numbers but tells me what they mean. The weekly insights have helped me avoid overtraining and improve my performance.

Newsletter.newsletterDescription: Be first to hear about new Garmin features, training insights, and AI improvements

GarminIntegration.title: Garmin Integration
GarminIntegration.subtitle: Connect Your Garmin Device in Seconds
GarminIntegration.description: Works with all Garmin devices and imports directly from Garmin Connect
GarminIntegration.directImportDesc: Sync automatically with your Garmin account
GarminIntegration.advancedMetricsDesc: Training Effect, Recovery Time, and more
GarminIntegration.betterThanConnectDesc: AI insights that make your data meaningful
GarminIntegration.beforeAfterTitle: Before vs After: Your Garmin Data

GarminFAQ.title: FAQ for Garmin Users
GarminFAQ.subtitle: Common Questions About Garmin Integration
GarminFAQ.description: Everything you need to know about connecting your Garmin device and getting AI insights
GarminFAQ.a1: We support all Garmin devices including Forerunner, Fenix, Vivoactive, Venu, and more. If your device syncs with Garmin Connect, it works with Lominic.
GarminFAQ.q2: How do I connect my Garmin account?
GarminFAQ.a2: Simply click 'Connect Garmin' and authorize Lominic to access your Garmin Connect data. We only read your activity data and never modify anything.
GarminFAQ.q3: What Garmin metrics do you analyze?
GarminFAQ.a3: We analyze Training Effect, Recovery Time, Training Load, Heart Rate Zones, VO2 Max, and all other metrics your Garmin device provides.
GarminFAQ.a4: Absolutely. We use bank-level security and never share your data. Your Garmin data stays private and you can disconnect anytime.
GarminFAQ.q5: Can I still use Garmin Connect?
GarminFAQ.a5: Yes! Lominic works alongside Garmin Connect. We provide AI insights while Garmin Connect continues to sync your device data.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.description: At Lominic, we are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal data. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our AI-powered training intelligence platform.
introduction.commitment: We are committed to transparency and will never sell your personal data to third parties.

dataCollection.title: Information We Collect
dataCollection.description: We collect information you provide directly to us and data from your connected fitness devices and platforms.

fitnessData.title: Fitness and Activity Data
fitnessData.description: When you connect your fitness devices or platforms, we may collect:
fitnessData.workouts: Workout data, including duration, distance, and performance metrics
fitnessData.gps: GPS location data from your activities
fitnessData.performance: Performance metrics and training load data

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Platform Data
thirdParty.description: We integrate with the following platforms and collect data according to their respective APIs:
thirdParty.garmin: Activity data, device information, and performance metrics from your Garmin account
thirdParty.strava: Workout data, routes, and activity information from your Strava account
thirdParty.apple: Health and fitness data from your  account

dataUsage.title: How We Use Your Information
dataUsage.description: We use your information to provide, improve, and personalize our services.

purposes.title: Primary Purposes
purposes.insights: Generate AI-powered training insights and recommendations
purposes.recommendations: Provide personalized training advice and recovery suggestions
purposes.trends: Analyze your training patterns and performance trends
purposes.service: Provide and maintain our platform and services
purposes.communication: Communicate with you about your account and our services
purposes.improvement: Improve our AI algorithms and platform features

ai.title: AI and Machine Learning
ai.description: We use your fitness data to train and improve our AI models to provide better insights and recommendations. This data is anonymized and aggregated for model training purposes.

dataSharing.title: Information Sharing and Disclosure
dataSharing.description: We are committed to protecting your privacy and do not sell your personal data.

when.title: When We May Share Your Data
when.legal: To comply with legal obligations or court orders
when.service: With service providers who assist in operating our platform (under strict confidentiality agreements)
when.protection: To protect our rights, property, or safety, or that of our users

never.title: What We Never Do
never.description: We never sell your personal data to third parties for marketing or advertising purposes.

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.description: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your data:
dataSecurity.encryption: End-to-end encryption for data transmission and storage
dataSecurity.access: Limited access controls and authentication requirements
dataSecurity.monitoring: Regular security monitoring and vulnerability assessments
dataSecurity.compliance: Compliance with applicable data protection regulations

yourRights.title: Your Rights and Choices
yourRights.description: You have the following rights regarding your personal data:
yourRights.accessDesc: Request a copy of the personal data we hold about you
yourRights.correctionDesc: Request correction of inaccurate or incomplete data
yourRights.deletionDesc: Request deletion of your personal data
yourRights.portabilityDesc: Request transfer of your data to another service
yourRights.restrictionDesc: Request restriction of processing of your data
yourRights.objectionDesc: Object to processing of your personal data

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookies.description: We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your experience:

types.title: Types of Cookies We Use
types.analyticsDesc: Help us understand how users interact with our platform

children.title: Children's Privacy
children.description: Our services are not intended for children under 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13.

changes.title: Changes to This Privacy Policy
changes.description: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or applicable laws.
changes.notification: We will notify you of any material changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the 'Last Updated' date.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us:

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.description: Welcome to Lominic. These Terms of Service govern your use of our AI-powered training intelligence platform and services.
introduction.agreement: By accessing or using our service, you agree to be bound by these terms and all applicable laws and regulations.

definitions.title: Definitions
definitions.serviceDesc: The Lominic platform, including all features, functionality, and content
definitions.userDesc: Any individual or entity that accesses or uses our service
definitions.dataDesc: Any information, including personal and fitness data, provided by users
definitions.contentDesc: Any text, images, data, or other materials created or shared through our service

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.description: By using our service, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms of Service.
acceptance.continued: Your continued use of the service constitutes acceptance of any modifications to these terms.

serviceDescription.title: Description of Service
serviceDescription.description: Lominic provides AI-powered training intelligence and insights by analyzing fitness data from connected devices and platforms.

features.title: Service Features
features.integration: Integration with fitness platforms and devices

availability.title: Service Availability
availability.description: We strive to maintain high service availability but do not guarantee uninterrupted access. We may modify, suspend, or discontinue the service at any time.

userAccounts.title: User Accounts
userAccounts.description: To access certain features of our service, you must create an account and provide accurate information.

registration.title: Account Registration
registration.accurate: Provide accurate, current, and complete information
registration.secure: Maintain the security of your account credentials
registration.notify: Notify us immediately of any unauthorized use
registration.responsible: You are responsible for all activities under your account

prohibited.title: Prohibited Account Activities
prohibited.sharing: Sharing your account credentials with others
prohibited.commercial: Using accounts for commercial purposes without permission
prohibited.harmful: Using accounts to harm our service or other users

thirdPartyIntegrations.title: Third-Party Integrations
thirdPartyIntegrations.description: Our service integrates with third-party fitness platforms and devices. Your use of these integrations is subject to their respective terms of service.

strava.title: Strava Integration
strava.description: Our integration with Strava is subject to the Strava API Agreement and their terms of service.
strava.data: We only access and display your Strava data to you, not to other users
strava.privacy: We respect your privacy choices and Strava's privacy settings
strava.attribution: We provide proper attribution to Strava as required by their API Agreement
strava.compliance: We comply with all Strava API usage restrictions and rate limits
strava.agreement: For complete details, please review the

garmin.title: Garmin Integration
garmin.description: Our integration with Garmin Connect is subject to Garmin's terms of service and API usage policies.

apple.title: Apple Health Integration
apple.description: Our integration with Apple Health is subject to Apple's HealthKit terms and privacy policies.

dataPrivacy.title: Data Privacy and Usage
dataPrivacy.description: We are committed to protecting your privacy and handling your data responsibly.

collection.title: Data Collection
collection.fitness: Fitness and activity data from connected platforms

usage.title: Data Usage
usage.service: To provide and improve our services
usage.improvement: To enhance our AI algorithms and features
usage.communication: To communicate with you about our services

sharing.title: Data Sharing
sharing.description: We do not sell your personal data. We may share data only with your consent, for legal compliance, or with service providers under strict confidentiality agreements.

intellectualProperty.description: All content, features, and functionality of our service are owned by Lominic or our licensors.

prohibitedUses.reverse: Reverse engineering or attempting to extract our source code

disclaimers.title: Disclaimers
disclaimers.description: We provide our service on an 'as is' and 'as available' basis.

warranties.title: No Warranties
warranties.description: We make no warranties about the accuracy, reliability, or completeness of our service or any content provided.

accuracy.title: AI Insights Accuracy
accuracy.description: While we strive for accuracy, AI-generated insights are for informational purposes only and should not replace professional medical or training advice.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParty.description: We are not responsible for the availability, accuracy, or content of third-party services we integrate with.

limitationOfLiability.title: Limitation of Liability
limitationOfLiability.description: To the maximum extent permitted by law, Lominic shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages.
limitationOfLiability.maximum: Our total liability shall not exceed the amount you paid for our service in the 12 months preceding the claim.

termination.title: Termination
termination.description: We may terminate or suspend your access to our service at any time, with or without cause.

grounds.title: Grounds for Termination
grounds.violation: Violation of these terms or applicable laws
grounds.request: Your request to terminate your account

effects.title: Effects of Termination
effects.description: Upon termination, your right to use the service ceases immediately, and we may delete your account and data in accordance with our privacy policy.

governingLaw.title: Governing Law
governingLaw.description: These terms are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the jurisdiction where Lominic operates.
governingLaw.jurisdiction: Any disputes shall be resolved in the courts of our jurisdiction, unless otherwise required by applicable law.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.description: We may modify these terms at any time by posting updated terms on our website.

contact.description: If you have questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us:
